des: "I love Roquefort dressing, but have never really found a bottled brand that I like.  This is wonderful!  Hope you like it.  Be sure to use a real mayonnaise rather than Miracle Whip for this one."
ins: In a medium bowl, whisk together the sour cream, vinegar, mayonnaise, salt, garlic powder and celery salt.  Crumble cheese to desired fineness and whisk into dressing.
